title: 服务器报错,跪求各位大佬看一下!!
author: 月夜雨溪
txt_content:
如题,一天到晚刷这个报错

[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: ****************************************
[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: * There is an attempt to load a chunk (7,-12) in dimension -1 that is already being loaded. This will cause weird chunk breakages.
[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: *  at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.originalLoadChunk(ChunkProviderServer.java:226)
[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: *  at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.loadChunk(ChunkProviderServer.java:202)
[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: *  at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73158_c(ChunkProviderServer.java:170)
[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: *  at net.minecraft.world.gen.ChunkProviderServer.func_73154_d(ChunkProviderServer.java:307)
[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: *  at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72964_e(World.java:751)
[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: *  at net.minecraft.world.World.func_147439_a(World.java:677)...
[15:59:52] [PaperSpigot - Lighting Thread/WARN]: ****************************************

跪求各位大佬看一下,给一个解决方法

谢谢！！

replies.author: dark7
replies.txt_content:
这个是区块错误报错。
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-274674-1-1.html
你安装上这个插件
/chunkfix 7 -12就可以修复这个区块了。

半夜回帖不易，如能解决您的问题，请给最佳，谢谢。

replies.author: 丛林水塘
replies.txt_content: 现在服务器能否正常运行？

replies.author: 月夜雨溪
replies.txt_content:
丛林水塘 发表于 2018-2-3 22:26
现在服务器能否正常运行？
可以,只是动不动刷这个报错,我都烦了

replies.author: 丛林水塘
replies.txt_content:
月夜雨溪 发表于 2018-2-3 22:27
可以,只是动不动刷这个报错,我都烦了
大约多长时间刷出来一次？

replies.author: 月夜雨溪
replies.txt_content:
丛林水塘 发表于 2018-2-3 22:33
大约多长时间刷出来一次？
2小时或3小时

replies.author: 丛林水塘
replies.txt_content:
月夜雨溪 发表于 2018-2-3 22:35
2小时或3小时
您曾知道是哪个插件引起了这些问题吗？您的服务器有因这个问题而崩溃的时候吗？【我的服务器也经常刷出这些文字，有的时候因此服务器卡死。。。】
